summary: Automatically recharges the currently equipped weapons.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=#ffff00]If you do find this mod useful then please endorse it![/color][/b][/center]
[center][url=http://gamer-mods.ru/load/tes_v_skyrim/gejmplej_i_animacija/avto_podzarjadka_oruzhija/16-1-0-2201][img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/flags/ru.gif[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.2game.info/detail.php?id=51332][img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/flags/jp.gif[/img][/url] [url=http://www.skycitizen.net/post/66092][img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/flags/cn.gif[/img][/url][/center]
[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]About Mod[/font][/size][/color]

This mod allows player and followers to automatically recharge equipped enchanted weapons in-combat / out of combat.
[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]Features[/font][/size][/color]

[list][*]Automatically recharges empty weapons when they are equipped and when they are being used.[/*]
[*]Overcharges the weapon utilizing the complete soul available.[/*]
[*]Gives the same amount of Enchanting EXP as manual recharging.[/*]
[*]Allows player/followers to NOT to consume soul gems after being used for recharging.[/*]
[*]Configurable via MCM.[/*]
[/list][line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]Notes[/font][/size][/color]

1. You need to have filled soul gems in your inventory.
2. One soul gem will be used at a time.
3. Soul gems will get used in the following order :

[list][*]Petty Soul Gem (Petty)[/*]
[*]Lesser Soul Gem (Lesser)[/*]
[*]Common Soul Gem (Common)[/*]
[*]Greater Soul Gem (Greater)[/*]
[*]Grand Soul Gem (Grand)[/*]
[*]Black Soul Gem (Grand)[/*]
[/list]
4. Soul gems with different sized souls are not supported. Black Star and Azura's Star are not supported either.
5. Maximum of 5 followers are supported.
[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]Updating[/font][/size][/color]

1. Download the updated files and overwrite with the existing files.

[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]Uninstallation[/font][/size][/color]

1. Disable "Enable AutoRechargeWeapons" from Mod Configuration Menu then close the menu OR type "stopquest tpARWQuest" in console. Save your game.
2. Deactivate mod and delete it.
[line]
